definition: Chang'e, the lady in the moon (Chinese mythology)/one of the Chang'e series of PRC lunar spacecraft
a legendary beauty who flew to the moon/the lady in the moon
good/beautiful

sentences.english: Chang'e 1 Lunar orbiter will achieve the ancient dream of the Chinese.
sentences.chinese: “嫦娥1号”将完成的，是中国人的一个古老的梦想。

sentences.english: In her panic, Chang`e drank it all up.
sentences.chinese: 嫦娥慌乱中服下了所有的仙丹。

sentences.english: Chang'e 2 will fly to the moon directly in a 120-hour journey.
sentences.chinese: 嫦娥二号“将经过120小时的旅程后直飞月球。

sentences.english: We will watch the moon tonight , and look for Chang are and Wu Gang.
sentences.chinese: 我们今晚赏月，去找嫦娥和吴刚。

sentences.english: The people lay out their mooncakes as an offering to her during Midautumn Festival.
sentences.chinese: 每逢中秋，世人都会摆出月饼，供奉嫦娥。

sentences.english: Chang E enters medicine Tibet the dressing table in hundred valuable chest, but unexpectedly is seen by loose Mongolia.
sentences.chinese: 嫦娥将药藏进梳妆台的百宝匣里，不料被蓬蒙看到了。

sentences.english: A correspondent interviewed the deputy chief designer of Chang'e-1, Sun Zezhou, before the Mid-Autumn Festival.
sentences.chinese: 记者在中秋节前夕访问了嫦娥一号副总设计师孙泽洲。

sentences.english: So here's an English-language version of the Chinese folktale about Change which you know already.
sentences.chinese: 接下来是你所知道的关于嫦娥的中国神话的英文版本。

sentences.english: Maybe in the future we could also send some people to accompany sister 'Chang'e', " said a college student in the survey.
sentences.chinese: 说不定以后还能派几个人给嫦娥姐姐时不常地做个伴。

sentences.english: She was with the rabbit, a silk belt around eternal love.
sentences.chinese: 玉兔伴嫦娥，绢带千古绕相思。

sentences.english: According to a Chinese folktale, Fairy Chang E lives with her moon rabbit in the Moon Palace.
sentences.chinese: 民间传说月亮上有广寒宫，宫里住着嫦娥和玉兔。

sentences.english: Microwave Sounder is one of the main payloads of ChangE-1 lunar satellite.
sentences.chinese: 星载微波探测仪是嫦娥一号卫星有效载荷之一。

sentences.english: This may be the fundamental reason for "Goddess flying to the Moon" changing to the toad.
sentences.chinese: 这就是“嫦娥奔月”后变为“蟾蜍”的根本原因。

sentences.english: Chang'e was the wife of Houyi in ancient Chinese myths.
sentences.chinese: 嫦娥是中国古代神话传说中后羿的妻子。

sentences.english: Many people often say that from the Mid-Autumn Moon story.
sentences.chinese: 通常有许多人讲，中秋节源自嫦娥奔月的故事。

sentences.english: Accompanied Chang, and ramming system elixir.
sentences.chinese: 陪同嫦娥，并捣制长生不老药。

definition: to fly to the moon
the Jade Hare/the moon
see 嫦娥[Chang2 e2]
Palace in the Moon (in folk tales)
another name for Xi Wangmu 西王母, Queen Mother of the West
Xi Wangmu, Queen Mother of the West, keeper of the peaches of immortality/popularly known as 王母娘娘
(literary) paternal grandmother
another name for 西王母[Xi1 wang2 mu3], Queen Mother of the West
Vega (star)/Weaving girl of folk tales
Xuan Nü, a fairy in Chinese mythology
to descend to the world (of immortals)
the secular world
the Jade lake on Mount Kunlun, residence of Xi Wangmu 西王母
Temple in Heaven (e.g. of the Jade Emperor)
Erlangshen, Chinese deity
(name of a person) Bai Suzhen, from Madame White Snake
Daji (c. 11th century BC), concubine of the last Shang dynasty king Zhou Xin 紂辛|纣辛[Zhou4 Xin1]
